channel.title: Pgp on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Pgp on My New Hugo Site

item.title: How to encrypt with GPG
item.description: Here are example of how to encrypt, decrypt, and manage PGP keys using GPG. Generate a new key pair $ gpg --gen-key gpg (GnuPG) 1.4.19; Copyright (C) 2015 Free Software Foundation, Inc. This is free software: you are free to change and redistribute it. There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law. Please select what kind of key you want: (1) RSA and RSA (default) (2) DSA and Elgamal (3) DSA (sign only) (4) RSA (sign only) Your selection?
